Paper.Title: Translation by Machine of Complex Nominals: Getting it Right

Section.Paragraph: We present a method for compositionally translating noun-noun (NN) compounds, using a word-level bilingual dictionary and syntactic templates for candidate generation, and corpus and dictionary statistics for selection. We propose a support vector learning-based method employing target language corpus and bilingual dictionary data, and evaluate it over a Englisha0 Japanese machine translation task.
We show the proposed method to be superior to previous methods and also robust over low-frequency NN compounds.
